short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copybook - seamlessly save, organize, and manage copied text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Store, organize, and utilize your best ideas with Copybook - a powerful tool for saving and managing copied text. Quickly save important text snippets and tag them for easy retrieval later. View information about the date, time, and source of each saved snippet, allowing you to easily track its context. Additionally, you can edit and delete entries at your own discretion, ensuring maximum organization of your content.

Copybook empowers you to work with various types of content easily and effectively, providing your ideas with a broader space to flourish.

With Copybook, every moment of your creative spark will be captured, and your productivity will soar! Try Copybook today and see how your creativity blossoms!

  release: 0.1.0
     - Separate all tabs into "Copied" and "Custom."
     - Add option to enable/disable the "Quick Open" button on all webpages.
     - Add option to pin records in the "Custom" tab.
     - Add title for custom records.
